title: Healthy & Tasty Vegetable Vermicelli Upma
content:
Ingredients: Vermicelli/ Semiya - 1 cup Water - 1 and 1/2 cup Mixed veggies - carrots,beans,sweet corn, green peas - 1/2 cup Onion - chopped- 1/2 cup Tomato - chopped - 1/2 cup Ginger - finely chopped - 1 tb sp Fried cashew nuts - 1 tb sp Coriander - 1/2 cup Green chillies - chopped- 2 Salt - as per taste Oil - 2 tb sp For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb Sp Procedure:
  • Dry roast vermicelli for 5 mins
  • Add oil on medium heated frying pan
  • Add tempering
  • Add green chillies and ginger pieces
  • Saute 1 min
  • Add chopped onion and saute 2 mins
  • Mix with veggies and saute 2 mins
  • Add chopped tomato
  • Saute them till mashy tomato
  • Add required water and salt
  • Boil water
  • Add Roasted vermicelli and stir
  • Close with lid
  • After one to 2 mins check
  • Cooked well
  • Garnish with cashew nuts and coriander
  • Serve hot withÂ Spicy Roasted chickpea Powder / Pappula podi / Bhuna Chana powder
